Class Answer

java.lang.Object
Application.Answer
public class Answer extends Object
Represents an answer in a Qinvalid input: '&A' system, with attributes for its text, author, timestamps, likes, and child answers.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Answer

      public Answer(UUID uuid, String bodyText, String author)
      Constructor for creating a new answer with a unique UUID.
      Parameters:
      uuid - Unique identifier for the answer.
      bodyText - The content of the answer.
      author - The author of the answer.

    • Answer

      public Answer(UUID uuid, String children, String bodyText, String author, Date postedDate, Date editedDate, int likes)
      Constructor for loading an existing answer from stored data.
      Parameters:
      uuid - Unique identifier for the answer.
      children - Comma-separated string of child answer UUIDs.
      bodyText - The content of the answer.
      author - The author of the answer.
      postedDate - The original posting date.
      editedDate - The last edited date.
      likes - The number of likes the answer has received.

  • Method Details

    • editBodyText

      public void editBodyText(String newBodyText)
      Edits the answer's text and updates the edited date.
      Parameters:
      newBodyText - The new content of the answer.

    • addChild

      public void addChild(UUID uuid)
      Adds a child answer UUID to the list of children.
      Parameters:
      uuid - The UUID of the child answer.

    • getDateAsString

      public String getDateAsString()
      Formats and returns the posted date as a readable string.
      Returns:
      The formatted date string (e.g., "Feb 14, 2025").
